caption.p: Protective efficacy of QIV against lethal challenge with the Ca/04 or B/Bris virus. (A, B, E, and F) Percentages of change in body weight and survival following challenge with either Ca/04 (A and B) or B/Bris (E and F) virus. (C, D, G, and H) At 5 dpc, a subset of mice ( n = 3/group) were sacrificed, and NTs and lungs were collected. Virus titers in NTs (C and G) and lung homogenates (D and H) were measured by TCID 50 in MDCK cells. (E and F) The asterisks denote one mouse outlier in the PBS/B/Bris group that did not show body weight loss, probably due to imperfect inoculation of the B/Bris challenge strain. The same mouse was the only one that survived the challenge with the B/Bris strain. The error bars indicate standard deviation.
